about_the_game:
Aliens have invaded, and you, caught in the middle through no fault of your own, must stand against them. It’s up to you to expel these extraterrestrial interlopers from your home. The Slush Force blends methodical turn-based strategy with high-intensity real-time tactical combat, demanding quick thinking and combined arms tactics to defend the world against a relentless enemy.

Story-Driven Campaign

Step into the shoes of Slush, the titular character, as you defend your home against an inexplicable and relentless alien threat. While the aliens seem to be a superior ground force, they exhibit strange inadequacies in other areas...

When unexpected opportunities arise, the choices you make will shape the future.

Multi-Layered Ground Combat

Engage in a dynamic mix of turn-based strategic planning and real-time close-quarters combat.

Clean up alien forces across diverse landscapes, from forests to roads to plains.

Your positioning on the strategic map dictates the conditions of the ensuing battles. Attacked an enemy vehicle without anti-tank weapons? Tough luck... Adapt or face the consequences.

Deep Combined Arms Tactics

Facing a merciless foe, close cooperation between different units is crucial. Is the enemy overwhelming?

Maybe an airplane can lend a hand with a 500 kg bomb or two, or perhaps rocket artillery can neutralize enemy firing positions. Make sure your support units are positioned wisely...

Physics-Driven Battles and Destructible Landscapes

Experience action on a physics-driven battlefield where projectiles follow ballistic paths, objects are fully destructible, and armor can deflect impacts at oblique angles.

Use the environment to your advantage, or risk falling victim to it...

Thought-Provoking Tactical Flexibility

Arm yourself with a range of weapons, from outdated rifles to modern tanks, or even captured or reverse-engineered alien technology. A plasma rifle in the 40-watt range? With so many options, there’s no “right” way to play. If it works, it works.

What will you do?

name: The Slush Force

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2+ cores and 2.3+ GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon® RX Vega 9, Intel® HD Graphics 630, or comparable integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard and mouse to play. Note that performance may vary due to system age and other factors.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 4+ cores and 2.7+ GHz recommended
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 960 or similar (4GB VRAM recommended)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard and mouse to play.

short_description: Aliens have invaded, and you are at the epicenter. Engage in methodical, turn-based strategy blended with high-intensity real-time tactical combat. In this relentless war, combined arms tactics are essential for victory. Defend the world and outsmart the extraterrestrial threat!
